Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Milan (Porta Garibaldi), NH Milano Grand Hotel Verdi is minutes from Porta Nuova and 10 Corso Como. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Corso Como and Antonio Colombo Arte Contemporanea.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 100 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with onsite massages or enjoy recreation amenities such as a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Milan (Porta Garibaldi), NH Milano Grand Hotel Verdi is minutes from Porta Nuova and 10 Corso Como. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Corso Como and Antonio Colombo Arte Contemporanea.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Porta Nuova - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
10 Corso Como - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Corso Como - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Antonio Colombo Arte Contemporanea - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Galleria Cardi and Company - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Piazza della Repubblica - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Photology - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Pirelli Tower - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Museo del Cinema - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Grattacielo Pirelli - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Indro Montanelli Public Gardens - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Cimitero Monumentale di Milano - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Archi di Porta Nuova - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Contemporary Arts Pavillion - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Padiglione d'Arte Contemporanea - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi

The preferred airport for NH Milano Grand Hotel Verdi is Milan (LIN-Linate) - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
